definitions.definition: plural of work in its countable senses

main_definition: plural of work in its countable senses

definitions.definition: A factory or factories, or a similar collection(s) of industrial facilities.
examples: The steel works almost fills the valley.

main_definition: A factory or factories, or a similar collection(s) of industrial facilities.

definitions.definition: A mechanism or machinery ; the means by which something happens.
examples: Aged and degraded oil and grease can really gum up the works .

definitions.definition: Everything or everything that is available or possible; especially, all available toppings on food .
examples: I'll have a Behemoth Burger with the works .

definitions.definition: Drastic treatment; abuse ; the axe ( dismissal ) .
A heroin or other drug addict 's equipment : syringes , needles , etc.

main_definition: A mechanism or machinery ; the means by which something happens.
secondary_definitions: ( with "the" ) Everything or everything that is available or possible; especially, all available toppings on food .
( with "the" ) Drastic treatment; abuse ; the axe ( dismissal ) .
( slang ) A heroin or other drug addict 's equipment : syringes , needles , etc.
